Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Erin O'Connor, Aashaka Desai, Bree McCausland, Eric Nahe, Peiyu Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model(int fWidth, int fHeight, int iWidth, int iHeight, Direction d)
      This is the constructor of the model, it sets the frame width, frame height, image width, image height and direction of the player character
